content.entry: You can enter as much text as you wish and let the scroller handle it. Also keep in mind you can use  html tags to format it, add links, images etc One other interesting feature is the fact that if no photos are specified for the slideshow on the left, this text field will expand on the entire display width so there are no nasty looking empty spaces.
